trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Front Royal
There were no other sightings in Front Royal on or around February 28th 1998
divs: Sighting DetailsI was a security guard at a private camping resort in the area. That evening theother guard on duty had informed me that the local newspaper had a front pagearticle about ufos being spotted about some 30 miles west of our location theprevious night. So at approximately 0300 as I was exiting a building that I hadbeen checking I felt a strangeness as in being watched. What I seen I still amnot sure but to put this into perspective my vehicle was parked approximately 10 from the doorway but when I exited the building all I could see was thesethree lights one to my right blue in color pulsing slowly almost hypnoticallyand then the center one was green also pulsing in the same manner and the to myleft was a red light that did not pulse but I think this red light made me awareof the situation I was in There wasnt any sounds Since this time I have beentrying to figure out what it was about I sometimes feel as though I hadcommunicated with them to be more giving and something about children
